title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enterprise AI: Now, Next, Future (ANT202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 企业人工智能：现在、未来与展望 (ANT202)
abstract: Explore the evolving landscape of Enterprise AI—from real-world POCs and case studies to emerging agentic systems and future-ready architectures. Hear how leading enterprises across multiple verticals – including banking, automotive, healthcare and telco – are working with Teradata, AWS and NVIDIA to scale real-world AI solutions that transform their businesses. This presentation is brought to you by Teradata, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 探索企业AI不断演进的格局——从真实世界的概念验证和案例研究到新兴的智能体系统和面向未来的架构。了解来自多个垂直行业的领先企业——包括银行、汽车、医疗保健和电信——如何与Teradata、AWS和NVIDIA合作，扩展真实世界的AI解决方案，从而实现业务转型。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Teradata提供。
